org.jruyi.core

Interface ITcpServerBuilder


  • public interface ITcpServerBuilder
    A builder to build an NIO service of TCP server.
    Since:
    2.2

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ITcpServerBuilder backlog(java.lang.Integer backlog)
      Sets the maximum length of the queue of incoming connections.
      ITcpServerBuilder bindAddr(java.lang.String bindAddr)
      Sets the address to bind.
      <I,O> INioService<I,O,? extends ITcpServerConfiguration> build()
      Builds a new TCP server.
      ITcpServerBuilder initCapacityOfChannelMap(int initCapacityOfChannelMap)
      Sets the initial capacity of the map holding TCP connections.
      ITcpServerBuilder performancePreferences(int connectionTime, int latency, int bandwidth)
      Sets the performance preferences.
      ITcpServerBuilder port(int port)
      Sets the port to listen on.
      ITcpServerBuilder recvBufSize(java.lang.Integer recvBufSize)
      Sets the number of bytes used to set the socket option SO_RCVBUF.
      ITcpServerBuilder reuseAddr(boolean reuseAddr)
      Sets true to reuse address, false to not.
      ITcpServerBuilder serviceId(java.lang.String serviceId)
      Sets the service ID of the TCP server to be built.

    • Method Detail

      • serviceId

        ITcpServerBuilder serviceId(java.lang.String serviceId)
        Sets the service ID of the TCP server to be built.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - the service ID to set
        Returns:
        this builder

      • bindAddr

        ITcpServerBuilder bindAddr(java.lang.String bindAddr)
        Sets the address to bind. Sets null to bind ANY addresses.
        Parameters:
        bindAddr - the address to bind
        Returns:
        this builder

      • port

        ITcpServerBuilder port(int port)
        Sets the port to listen on. This is a mandatory property to build a TCP server.
        Parameters:
        port - the port to listen on
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified port is negative or greater than 65535

      • initCapacityOfChannelMap

        ITcpServerBuilder initCapacityOfChannelMap(int initCapacityOfChannelMap)
        Sets the initial capacity of the map holding TCP connections.
        Parameters:
        initCapacityOfChannelMap - initial capacity to set
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified initCapacityOfChannelMap is less than 4

      • backlog

        ITcpServerBuilder backlog(java.lang.Integer backlog)
        Sets the maximum length of the queue of incoming connections.
        Parameters:
        backlog - the maximum length of the queue of incoming connections to set
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified backlog is less than 1

      • reuseAddr

        ITcpServerBuilder reuseAddr(boolean reuseAddr)
        Sets true to reuse address, false to not.
        Parameters:
        reuseAddr - indicates whether to reuse address
        Returns:
        this builder

      • recvBufSize

        ITcpServerBuilder recvBufSize(java.lang.Integer recvBufSize)
        Sets the number of bytes used to set the socket option SO_RCVBUF. Sets null to not set the socket option SO_RCVBUF.
        Parameters:
        recvBufSize - the maximum socket receive buffer in bytes
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified recvBufSize is less than 1

      • performancePreferences

        ITcpServerBuilder performancePreferences(int connectionTime,
                                       int latency,
                                       int bandwidth)
        Sets the performance preferences.
        Parameters:
        connectionTime - indicates the relative importance of short connection time
        latency - indicates the relative importance of low latency
        bandwidth - indicates the relative importance of high bandwidth
        Returns:
        this builder

      • build

        <I,O> INioService<I,O,? extends ITcpServerConfiguration> build()
        Builds a new TCP server.
        Type Parameters:
        I - the type of the inbound data
        O - the type of the outbound data
        Returns:
        a new TCP client
